name: tapOutput
signature: { <X, R2, Out>(f: (out: NoInfer<Out>) => Effect<X, never, R2>): <In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R2 | R>; <Out, In, R, X, R2>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (out: Out) => Effect<X, never, R2>): Schedule<Out, In, R | R2>; }
description:
Returns a new schedule that runs the given effectful function for each output
before continuing execution.
*Details This function allows side effects to be performed on each output produced by
the schedule. It does not modify the schedule’s behavior but ensures that the
provided function `f` runs after each step.
